title: Richard Thompson - Hand of Kindness (1983, 320KB)
description:
Richard Thompson - Hand of Kindness (1983, 320KB) stereo



This is one of RichardÃ‚Â´s finest and most unappreciated albums.


I think it's the closest to a live sound of any of his studio recordings.


The zydeco influence with John Kirkpatrick's accordion, love it...!!.


Why Richard Thompson isn't recognized as a prominent guitar master is beyond me.


One listen to his aching English love ballad `Devonside' about "the girl with the 


shiver in her eyes" should be convincing enough.


This was his last great album with producer Joe Boyd,  unfortunately...
